com.joliciel.talismane.terminology

Interface Term

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TermWrapper

    public interface Term
    A single term extracted from a corpus.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        String getText()

      • getHeads

        Set<Term> getHeads()
        The heads are any terms containing this term, with exactly one degree of additional syntactic depth. e.g. for the term "wine", "bottle of wine" is a head.

      • getExpansions

        Set<Term> getExpansions()
        The expansions are any terms in which this term is contained, with exactly 1 degree of additional syntactic depth. For example, for the term "bottle", "bottle of wine" is an expansion. However, "bottle of red wine" is not an expansion (2 degrees of depth) - it is an expansion of "bottle of wine".

      • getParents

        Set<Term> getParents()
        The parents are terms of which this term is an expansion. For example, for the term "bottle of wine", "bottle" is a parent.

      • getContexts

        List<Context> getContexts()

      • addHead

        void addHead(Term head)

      • addExpansion

        void addExpansion(Term expansion)

      • addContext

        void addContext(Context context)

      • getFrequency

        int getFrequency()
        The number of times this term appears in the corpus.

      • getExpansionCount

        int getExpansionCount()
        The number of expansions this term has.

      • getHeadCount

        int getHeadCount()
        The number of heads this term has.

      • getLexicalWordCount

        int getLexicalWordCount()
        The number of lexical words in this term (as opposed to function words).

      • setLexicalWordCount

        void setLexicalWordCount(int lexicalWordCount)

      • isMarked

        boolean isMarked()
        Has this term been marked as a true term for exporting?

      • setMarked

        void setMarked(boolean marked)
